sentence: The novel challenge to the reelection bid of Rep. Madison Cawthorn, one of the House's brashest supporters of Trump and the lie that the 2020 election was stolen, could set a precedent to challenge other Republicans who swore to uphold the Constitution, then encouraged the attack.
author: Jonathan Weisman New York Times
title: Cawthorn challenge raises the question: Who is an 'insurrectionist'?
